name: Death Penalty Hero 死刑勇者
name_original: Death Penalty Hero 死刑勇者
description:
The world doesn't need heroe anymore, humans and demons live together "peacefully" under the framework of the "law" ...... In the face of such falsehood and hypocrisy, a rogue has no ability to fight back, and "justice" can only be buried in one's heart?

Open world: Explore cities and labyrinths, discover stories, and find all kinds of weapons.



Recruitment: Solve their problems, get to know their hearts, and let them join your camp!


Equipment and Skills: Configure the right equipment to use the right skills, different combinations will be the key to win or lose the battle.


The daily life of an adventurer: without money you have to go on quests!


Arena: Improve your personal abilities by fighting!
